721625f-b.title: Manhattan: Market Street - Monroe Street
721625f-b.text:
(1)
Market Street, south from but Yot including Monroe, to and
including Cherry Streets. Also shon is Markct Slip, (a continu-
ation of Market Street, south nC~Chiurry Street), east side, south
from and including Cherry t. eet, to and including the East River.
The Manhattan Bridge is shown in the background, extending out over
the East River to the Williamshurg Section of the Borough of Kings.
(Brooklyn).
Larch 3, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The same, showing a closer view of No. 72 Market Street, adioining
the S.E. corner of Monroe Street. The building is the Hamilton
House, an old settlement house now used by the Henry Street Nurses.
September 7, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
